cq.q: Where did everything in the universe come from?
How long did it take God to create everything?
What was God's usual response to the things he created at the end of each day?
In what way did God make man different than the animals?
cq.a: He made man in his image and in his likeness.

cq.q: What did God say would be the responsibility of the human beings?
cq.a: They would have authority over the earth and over the animals to care for them.

cq.q: Why were Adam and Eve not ashamed that they were naked?
cq.a: There was no sin in the world.

cq.q: What was the snake's first question to Eve?
cq.a: "Did God really tell you not to eat the fruit from any of the trees in the garden?"
